title: 论坛编辑帖子500错误
author: 鬼畜畜
txt_content:

Please report this message and include the following information to us.
Thank you very much!URL:http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=post&action=edit&extra=&editsubmit=yesServer:mc-slbDate:2017/08/27 23:15:06Powered by Tengine

replies.author: 凛
replies.txt_content:
我也有几次这样
别人也有说出现这种情况
应该只是服务器的锅
注意备份帖子代码

replies.txt_content: 换火狐一类浏览器就行了，反正我是这样

replies.txt_content: Chrome IE 只要编辑帖子就是500错误，我现在不敢编辑帖子了
